attributes.action: stop the school hours extending to 6pm
attributes.additional_details:
The government is considering to extend the school hours from 9am to 6pm

I think the government is talking rubbish because most children are already tired when It comes to hometime.extending the hours extending will just make it worse

please sign the petition and together we can keep the existing hours.100,000 signatures will be really helpful and will be to the commons to debate
